Venue availability: Finding a suitable venue that is available on the desired date and within the budget may be difficult.
Catering: Choosing a caterer that meets the dietary needs and preferences of attendees can be challenging.
Marketing: Reaching the target audience and generating enough interest in the event may be difficult.
Volunteers: Finding enough volunteers to help with the planning and execution of the event can be challenging.
Sponsorships: Securing sponsorships for the event may be difficult, especially if the event is not well-known or has a limited budget.
